languages.text: {n}Идира потирает нос.{/n} "Да она... да она не то чтобы уж прямо такая занимательная была, Лорд-капитан... вот что: если захотите про что интересное послушать — это я завсегда. Запросто развею скуку и обогащу ваш запас баек. А про то, как я за переборкой всех расплавила... ну, неохота вспоминать в подробностях, ладно?"

{n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира потирает нос.{/n} "Да она... да она не то чтобы уж прямо такая занимательная была, Лорд-капитан... вот что: если захотите про что интересное послушать — это я завсегда. Запросто развею скуку и обогащу ваш запас баек. А про то, как я за переборкой всех расплавила... ну, неохота вспоминать в подробностях, ладно?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉揉了揉鼻子。{/n}“那场……那场旅行并不算很有趣，舰长大人……你看，如果你想听故事的话，来找我就对了。我可以用我知道的每个故事来招待你，这都没问题。不过，如果你想了解我是怎么把隔壁甲板上的每个人都熔成肉泥的话……呃，我真的不想再去回忆那件事情的细节了，好吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

languages.text: {n}Idira se rasca la nariz.{/n} «No fue... no fue un viaje muy divertido, Lord Capitán... pero, mire, si quiere que le entretenga, soy la mujer indicada. Puedo entretenerle con una de las historias de mi colección, no hay problema. Pero si quiere saber los detalles de la vez que derretí a todos los de la bahía de al lado... bueno, preferiría evitarlo, ¿entiende?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

Puedo entretenerle con una de las historias de mi colección, no hay problema. Pero si quiere saber los detalles de la vez que derretí a todos los de la bahía de al lado... bueno, preferiría evitarlo, ¿entiende?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは鼻をこする。{/n}「それは…すごく楽しい旅というわけではなかったわ、ロード・キャプテン…でも、そうね。もしお楽しみになりたいというのなら…あたいの得意分野でもあるのよ。物語集からお話を1つ、聞かせてあげるわね。でも、聞きたいのが隣のベイのみんなを溶かした件についてなら…そのことについては、あまり多くを語りたくはないの、わかってくれるでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira reibt sich die Nase.{/n} "Es war ... es war kein besonders spaßiger Ausflug, Lord Captain ... Aber wenn Ihr unterhalten werden möchtet, bin ich die Richtige. Ich unterhalte Euch gern mit einer der Geschichten aus meiner Sammlung. Wenn Ihr jedoch hören wolltet, wie ich damals alle im Raum nebenan eingeschmolzen habe ... nun, da möchte ich lieber nicht ins Detail gehen, gut?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

Ich unterhalte Euch gern mit einer der Geschichten aus meiner Sammlung. Wenn Ihr jedoch hören wolltet, wie ich damals alle im Raum nebenan eingeschmolzen habe ... nun, da möchte ich lieber nicht ins Detail gehen, gut?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ce... Ce n'était pas vraiment une partie de plaisir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}répond Idira en se frottant le nez.{/n} Enfin, si vous cherchez des distractions, vous pouvez compter sur moi. Je me ferai un plaisir de vous raconter l'une de mes histoires, et croyez-moi, j'en ai un paquet. Par contre, ne me demandez pas vous parler de la fois où j'ai fait fondre tout le monde dans la baie voisine... Je préfère ne pas entrer dans les détails. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

Ce n'était pas vraiment une partie de plaisir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}répond Idira en se frottant le nez.{/n} Enfin, si vous cherchez des distractions, vous pouvez compter sur moi. Je me ferai un plaisir de vous raconter l'une de mes histoires, et croyez-moi, j'en ai un paquet. Par contre, ne me demandez pas vous parler de la fois où j'ai fait fondre tout le monde dans la baie voisine... Je préfère ne pas entrer dans les détails. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira burnunu ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Pek keyifli bir yolculuk değildi Lord Kaptan... Ama gülmek, eğlenmek istersen doğru yerdesin. Koleksiyonumdaki hikâyelerden birini seve seve anlatırım, sorun olmaz. Lakin ille de bitişik bölmedekileri erittiğim hikâyeyi dinlemek istiyorsan... Ayrıntılara girmek istemezsem kusura bakma."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira rubs her nose.{/n} "It wasn't... it wasn't like it was a very fun trip, Lord Captain... but look: if you want to be entertained — I'm the woman for the job. I'll entertain you with one of the stories from my collection, no problem. But if you want to hear about the time I melted everyone in the bay next door... well, I just don't really want to go into the details on that one, all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira burnunu ovalıyor.{/n} "O çok... Çok neşeli bir yolculuk değildi Lord Kaptan. Ama şu var, gerçekten eğlenceli bir şeyler dinlemek istiyorsan doğru kişiye geldin. Aklımdaki hikâyelerden birini anlatırım, eğlenceye eğlence demezsin. Hiç dert değil. Ama illaki yan bölmedeki herkesi erittiğim hikâyeyi dinlemek istiyorsan... Yani onda çok ayrıntıya girmesem sorun olur mu?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
